configuration:
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname {{ rm_container }}
yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.class org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.scheduler.capacity.CapacityScheduler
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.mapreduce_shuffle.class org.apache.hadoop.mapred.ShuffleHandler
yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb {{ nodemanager_memory }}
yarn.nodemanager.resource.cpu-vcores {{ vcores }}
yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb {{ scheduler_minimum_memory }}
yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb {{ scheduler_maximum_memory }}
yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-vcores 1
yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-vcores {{ vcores }}
yarn.nodemanager.vmem-check-enabled false
yarn.log-aggregation-enable true
yarn.nodemanager.log-aggregation.roll-monitoring-interval-seconds 3600
yarn.scheduler.increment-allocation-mb 128
yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs {{ bind_dir_on_container }}/hadoop_files/yarn/local
yarn.nodemanager.pmem-check-enabled true
yarn.nodemanager.vmem-pmem-ratio 2.1
yarn.nodemanager.disk-health-checker.enable true
yarn.nodemanager.disk-health-checker.max-disk-utilization-per-disk-percentage 95.0
yarn.resourcemanager.nodemanagers.heartbeat-interval-ms 5000
yarn.scheduler.fair.assignmultiple true
yarn.scheduler.fair.dynamic.max.assign true
yarn.scheduler.fair.max.assign -1
yarn.scheduler.fair.continuous-scheduling-enabled false
{% if global_hdfs %}
hadoop.zk.address {{ namenode_container_name if namenode_container_name is defined else rm_container }}:2181
{% endif %}
